original_text: “His sons shall wage war and assemble a multitude of great forces, which shall keep coming and overflow and pass through, and again shall carry the war as far as his fortress.
korean_text: 그러나 그의 아들들이 전쟁을 준비하고 심히 많은 군대를 모아서 물이 넘침 같이 나아올 것이며 그가 또 와서 남방 왕의 견고한 성까지 칠 것이요

sentences.original_text: and assemble a multitude of great forces,
which shall keep coming and overflow
and again shall carry the war as far as his fortress.
sentences.korean_translation: 다시 그의 요새에 이르기까지 전쟁을 치르리라
